caption: Figure 1: Comparisons of embedding shifts after two types of modifications for the HC3 dataset.
description: The chart displays the distribution of embedding shifts after adversarial token perturbation and sentence shuffling for human and generated texts in the HC3 dataset.

caption: Figure 4: Topological Time Series for remaining datasets from current review. We omitted the results for Au-Tex23en, because virtually all texts there had the dimension of 0.
description: Figure 4 is a set of histograms showing the distribution of topological time series scores for different datasets, illustrating variations in dimensionality between human-written and machine-generated texts.

caption: Figure 3: Attention maps on two excerpts from DAG-Pap22, Layer 15, Head 15.
description: The chart displays attention maps for human and machine-generated text excerpts from the DAGPap22 dataset, highlighting differences in attention patterns.

caption: Figure 4: Topological Time Series for remaining datasets from current review. We omitted the results for AuTex23en, because virtually all texts there had the dimension of 0.
description: The chart displays the topological time series distributions for various datasets, excluding AuTex23es due to its texts having a dimension of 0.
